snippet: World Player of the Year Cristiano Ronaldo has turned down the chance to leave Real Madrid for an unnamed Chinese club for a transfer fee of 300 million euros (257 million pounds), his agent said on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: World Player of the Year Cristiano Ronaldo has turned down the chance to leave Real Madrid for an unnamed Chinese club for a transfer fee of 300 million euros (257 million pounds), his agent said on Thursday.

headline.main: Ronaldo Rejects 300 Million Euro Move to China-Agent
headline.print_headline: Ronaldo Rejects 300 Million Euro Move to China-Agent
